title: Ep - 158 - BEHIND THE SCENES OF AMERICAN IDOL
description:
American Idol Executive Producers Trish Kinane and Megan Michaels Wolflick give a behind the scenes look at American Idol on ABC. 


Jersey Shore stars Pauly D and Vinny are on a search for love with 20 single women competing for their hearts on Double Shot of Love on MTV. Actor Doug Budin helps Kate dissect this reality television gem.


Meredith Masonry from Take it Or Leave It podcast helps review the Snowden wedding episode of Seeking Sister Wives on TLC. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey
